typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SourceTableName as string,
	TargetTableName as string,
	PrimaryKeyList as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: (concat("delta/bronze/",$TargetTableName,"/"))) ~> BronzeDelta
BronzeDelta window(over(PkList = $PrimaryKeyList),
	desc("DateInserted", true),
	RowVersion = denseRank()) ~> Window1
